basics.summary: I graduated with a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa Decemeber 17th, Fall 2023.

work.summary: Use of containerization for a big data platform
highlights: Deploy a containerized environment for application development for DISA BDP
Utilize the development environment to ingest and visualize data
Explore the data to detect attack vectors based on indicators of compromise of cybersecurity
